RAD_DATASOURCES.DEFAULT_WHERE: CONTRACT_REF_NO IN (SELECT CONTRACT_REF_NO FROM OLTBS_CONTRACT WHERE MODULE_CODE = 'OL')

RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: SELECT A.CONTRACT_REF_NO,A.USER_REF_NO FROM OLTBS_CONTRACT A WHERE A.MODULE_CODE IN ('OL') AND A.CONTRACT_STATUS IN ('A','L') AND A.AUTH_STATUS = 'A' AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM OLVWS_AVL_PROD_BR_USR WHERE PRODUCT_CODE = sypks_utils.get_product(A.CONTRACT_REF_NO) AND BRANCH_CODE = GLOBAL.CURRENT_BRANCH AND USER_ID = GLOBAL.USER_ID)

SELECT A.DISCLOSURE_CODE,B.DISCLOSURE_DESCRIPTION FROM LBTMS_PROD_DISCLOSURE A, LBTMS_DISCLOSURE B WHERE A.PRODUCT_CODE=(SELECT PRODUCT_CODE FROM OLTBS_CONTRACT WHERE CONTRACT_REF_NO = ?) AND A.DISCLOSURE_CODE = B.DISCLOSURE_CODE AND B.AUTH_STAT = 'A' AND B.RECORD_STAT='O' AND A.DISCLOSURE_CODE NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT DISCLOSURE_CODE FROM LBTBS_CONTRACT_DISC_MASTER WHERE CONTRACT_REF_NO <> ?) ORDER BY A.DISCLOSURE_CODE

SELECT DISTINCT A.DISCLOSURE_CODE,B.DISCLOSURE_DESCRIPTION FROM LBTMS_PROD_DISCLOSURE A, LBTMS_DISCLOSURE B,LBTBS_CONTRACT_DISC_MASTER C WHERE A.PRODUCT_CODE=(SELECT PRODUCT_CODE FROM OLTBS_CONTRACT WHERE CONTRACT_REF_NO=?) AND A.DISCLOSURE_CODE = B.DISCLOSURE_CODE AND B.AUTH_STAT = 'A' AND B.RECORD_STAT='O' AND C.DISCLOSURE_CODE IN (SELECT DISTINCT DISCLOSURE_CODE FROM LBTBS_CONTRACT_DISC_MASTER WHERE PARENT_DISCLOSURE_CODE IS NULL) ORDER BY A.DISCLOSURE_CODE

RAD_CALLFORM.CALLFORM_XSD_TYPE_DESC: ' AND MASTER_MULTI_RECORD='Y' AND CALL_FORM_TYPE='DATA' AND CALL_FORM_MODULE='CS
